Package engine

Class DrawManager

java.lang.Object
engine.DrawManager
public final class DrawManager
extends java.lang.Object
Manages screen drawing.

    • initDrawing

      First part of the drawing process. Initialices buffers, draws the background and prepares the images.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw in.

      Draws an entity, using the apropiate image.
      Parameters:
      entity - Entity to be drawn.
      positionX - Coordinates for the left side of the image.
      positionY - Coordinates for the upper side of the image.

    • drawResults

      public void drawResults​(Screen screen, int score, int livesRemaining, int shipsDestroyed, float accuracy, boolean isNewRecord)
      Draws game results.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw on.
      score - Score obtained.
      livesRemaining - Lives remaining when finished.
      shipsDestroyed - Total ships destroyed.
      accuracy - Total accuracy.
      isNewRecord - If the score is a new high score.

    • drawNameInput

      public void drawNameInput​(Screen screen, char[] name, int nameCharSelected)
      Draws interactive characters for name input.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw on.
      name - Current name selected.
      nameCharSelected - Current character selected for modification.

      level - Game difficulty level.
      number - Countdown number.
      bonusLife - Checks if a bonus life is received.
